basics.name: Stefan Izdrail
basics.label: Senior Engineer
basics.summary:
Hello there! I'm **Stefan**, a senior software developer from Romania, now living in the United Kingdom.  
With over 13 years of experience, I am passionate about building enterprise applications. Nothing excites me more than tackling a client's problem head-on and selecting the best programming language for the job.

work.name: Debt Register
work.summary: Debt Register is a platform for managing and distributing debt. It allows users to track their debt and make payments to the company.
highlights: Build New Public Rest API
Improved User Experience
Improved Deployment Process using Github Actions

work.name: Avrillo
work.summary: Licensed conveyance company in London, UK trusted by 40000+ clients. Hire UK's No. 1 awarded conveyancing experts to move cheaper and safer.
highlights: Implemented a new laravel microservice
Implemented Xero API
Implemented Event Driven Architecture using RabbitMQ
Created the deployment architecture using AWS & Docker

work.name: Hornby
work.summary: Hornby Hobbies Limited is a British-owned scale model manufacturing company which has been focused on model railways.
highlights: Implemented a new laravel microservice
Implemented Xero API
Implemented Event Driven Architecture using RabbitMQ
Created the deployment architecture using AWS & Docker

work.name: SWSM
work.summary: Save Water Save Money has delivered 2.75 million water saving devices to more than 1 million customers, saving over 51 billion litres of water.
highlights: Refactored the existing code to use the new symfony framework
Implemented a new post code microservice
Created the deployment architecture using docker & kubernetes

work.name: Lzo Media
work.description: Awesome Software Company that I've firstly founded
work.summary: Created a new platform for managing and distributing content across multiple WordPress sites.I've sold this platform to a major media company based in the UK
highlights: Build an platform for bloggers to monetize their content
High Traffic Websites and Mobile Apps - over 250k daily active users
Laravel Integrations
Wordpress Themes & Plugins Development

volunteer.summary: Worked on parts of the ecommerce platforms built with Drupal.
highlights: Implemented new payment gateway
Improved the checkout process
Developed a new feature for the Drupal Commerce module

skills.summary: Highly skilled in UI design with a strong understanding of design principles, user experience, and industry-standard tools. Proficient in creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications.

skills.summary: Proficient in hardware design and software development. Excellent at understanding the fundamentals of electronics and software design.

references.name: Jon Basildon
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

references.name: Laurie Bream
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Monica, her exceptional skills and talent were evident during her time at High-Tech Inc. I am confident that she will make a valuable impact at any organization she joins.
